review: Extremely easy to setup and worked as expected with no hesitation in receiving the wireless signal.  The benefit of Fire TV versus Fire Stick is the Fire TV remote has voice commands.
author: Ron

review: NOTE: The FireTV is a pretty cool device for the money, however, if you have an older HD set (like my Fujitsu plasma in the bedroom) this might not work well for you. The box only outputs 1080P or 720P and the old Fujitsu doesn't play well with either of those resolutions. If you have a newer TV you're golden, just be aware that this box does not  output 480i/p or 1080i  Perhaps a firmware update might come along to fix this?
author: Christian

review: This is a great addition to anyone who likes watching TV and/or playing games, and/or listening to music. Amazon's selection and support is noteworthy and the unit works perfectly. The ease of finding just the right program or movie is further enhanced by the voice feature, where you just say the name of the movie or program and it pops up on the screen. Nothing could be easier. I am thrilled with this newest innovation from Amazon.
author: Robert's Review

review: We love the Amazon Fire TV!  It is very easy to use and to search for things.
author: Michelle Leed
